thread.title: Dawn Murphy
thread.title_full: Lifestyle Furniture reviewed by Dawn Murphy

author: Dawn Murphy
title: Dawn Murphy
text: I was a little nervous ordering a dining table and chairs, a coffee table and mirror from a website as I usually like to see items before a purchase. I had nothing to worry about, everything I bought was perfect and exactly as described. I will definitely buy from Lifestyle Furniture again!!!
